title: League update lagging during draf/Rank ?
body: I am not sure If I am only but ever since I update to the beta I lag  so hard that I can't ban a champ! Is their a solution yet because now I cant play rank without getting kicked out!

replies.body:
We've noticed some poor performance from the Beta Client when played on lower-spec machines. For now, you may want to use the Legacy Client until we've made more headway on optimizing the new client. You can launch into the Legacy Client at the login screen as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.

I couldn't get on last night for connection issues on Riots end. Today I tried to play draft and when it was my turn to ban I could not click on anything, got the same connection issue, then got leaver-bustered for the next match.
